exec.description: Start and stop Percy around a supplied command.
examples: $ percy exec -- echo "percy is running around this echo command"
$ percy exec -- bash -c "echo foo && echo bar"

allowed-hostname.name: allowed-hostname
allowed-hostname.description: Allowable hostname(s) to capture assets from

network-idle-timeout.name: network-idle-timeout
network-idle-timeout.description: [default: 50] Asset discovery network idle timeout (in milliseconds)

finalize.description: Finalize a build. Commonly used for parallelized builds, especially when the number of parallelized processes is unknown.

health-check.description: Determines if the Percy Agent process is currently running

snapshot.description: Snapshot a directory containing a pre-built static website.

snapshot-files.name: snapshot-files
snapshot-files.description: [default: **/*.html,**/*.htm] Glob or comma-seperated string of globs for matching the files and directories to snapshot.

ignore-files.name: ignore-files
ignore-files.description: [default: ] Glob or comma-seperated string of globs for matching the files and directories to ignore.

base-url.name: base-url
base-url.description: [default: /] If your static files will be hosted in a subdirectory, instead of the webserver's root path, set that subdirectory with this flag.

allowed-hostname.name: allowed-hostname
allowed-hostname.description: Allowable hostname(s) to capture assets from

network-idle-timeout.name: network-idle-timeout
network-idle-timeout.description: [default: 50] Asset discovery network idle timeout (in milliseconds)

args.name: snapshotDirectory
args.description: [default: .] A path to the directory you would like to snapshot

examples:
$ percy start
info: percy has started on port 5338.

allowed-hostname.name: allowed-hostname
allowed-hostname.description: Allowable hostname(s) to capture assets from

network-idle-timeout.name: network-idle-timeout
network-idle-timeout.description: [default: 50] Asset discovery network idle timeout (in milliseconds)

examples:
$ percy stop
info: percy has stopped.

upload.description: Upload a directory containing static snapshot images.

files.name: files
files.description: [default: **/*.png,**/*.jpg,**/*.jpeg] Glob or comma-seperated string of globs for matching the files and directories to snapshot.

ignore.name: ignore
ignore.description: [default: ] Glob or comma-seperated string of globs for matching the files and directories to ignore.

args.name: uploadDirectory
args.description: [default: .] A path to the directory containing static snapshot images
